title: Alesha Dixon shares first picture of baby daughter she gave birth to seven weeks ago

Alesha Dixon has shared the very first picture of her baby daughter, who she told fans had arrived seven weeks ago.

The TV judge sparked rumours she'd secretly given birth after being spotted on the set of America's Got Talent: The Champions on Friday wearing a crop top.

Taking to Instagram days later on her 41st birthday, Alesha shared an adorable snap of her newborn sleeping under a white blanket - while also revealing her name.

"Anaya Safiya. 7 weeks ago this little angel came into our lives! As I celebrate my birthday today I feel like the luckiest girl on the planet," Alesha penned in the caption.

Alesha, who also has five-year-old daughter Azura with partner Azuka Ononye, was soon inundated with well wishes from her thousands of followers.

"Omg 7 weeks ago, what a beautiful little poppet, congratulations darling, celebrating a bit differently to last year," commented one.

(Image: Instagram)

Back in May, Alesha confirmed news of her pregnancy during a live episode of Britain's Got Talent.

Alesha stood up to reveal her blossoming bump for the first time midway through a song and dance routine performed by hosts Ant McPartlin and Declan Donnelly.

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

(Image: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

When asked about her happy news by presenters Ant and Dec, Alesha said: "Over the moon, yes. Lovely place to celebrate it."

While co-judge David Walliams joked that the baby was his.

"We're very happy. These things happen when you're on the tour," David teased.

(Image: Internet Unknown)

Once the secret was out, Alesha rocked some incredible maternity wear throughout the rest of the series and for the final of Britain's Got Talent: The Champions at the weekend stepped out in a stunning see-through dress.

The climax of the show - which saw dance act Twist and Pulse crowned overall winners - was filmed some months ago.

Alesha stepped out in Los Angeles on Friday looking noticeably trimmer in a crop top, prompting rumours she'd already welcomed her second child.

(Image: Twitter)

(Image: aleshaofficial/Instagram)

The former Mis-Teeq singer will have her hands full as she juggles being a mum of two with her new day job on America's Got Talent: The Champions.

After taking Mel B's role on the panel, Alesha join Simon Cowell, Heidi Klum and Howie Mandel in judging acts from series from around the world.

She shared snaps on social media of her first day on set, but took care to only film herself from the waist up.

(Image: Getty)

(Image: Instagram)

Her decision to keep the news of her second daughter's arrival private, comes after she also didn't announce she was pregnant with her first child Azura until after she had given birth.

The mum previously said she had thought twice about sharing details of her private life following her heartbreaking split from husband MC Harvey .

Alesha ended her marriage to the So Solid Crew rapper after just one year when she discovered he'd cheated in 2006.

The former Mis-Teeq singer went on to find love with professional model and dancer Azuka. It's believed they marred in secret in 2017 though neither of them has confirmed the news.

Alesha was open about her desire to have more children with Azuka.

She told You magazine: "Not a day goes by without me longing for another baby.

“I don’t know whether it will happen given my age, but I adore the idea of a large family and I hope I will be lucky."
description: The TV judge made the announcement after she was spotted wearing a crop top while filming scenes for America's Got Talent: The Champions
